title: What are the best consumer eye tracking devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: As far as I know, Galaxy S III may be the only device supported it that we can see in our daily life.But those people who own it never use this function becasue they don't need to. You touch the screen will always be quicker than the device catchs motion of your eyes. In fact , it maybe take only 1 second or less to track. But one second is enough to make you move your finger.Besides,there may be some amazing devices that make this techonology more user-friendly.I think, however, people's eyes is really small for camera to track.
